Literature.Title: Identification and Rational Design of a Novel Antibacterial Peptide Dermaseptin-AC from the Skin Secretion of the Red-Eyed Tree Frog Agalychnis callidryas.
Literature.Author: Gong Z, Pei X, Ren S, Chen X, Wang L, Ma C, Xi X, Chen T, Shaw C, Zhou M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=21.53 µM,Horse erythrocytes:40% Hemolysis=45 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=32µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=16µM),Candida albicans NCTC 1467(MIC=64µM),Candida albicans NCTC 1467(MBC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=128µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=32µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=32µM)
